strings.FREE_ITEM_THEREMIN_PICKUP: Increase attack speed near the Teleporter.
strings.FREE_ITEM_THEREMIN_DESC: Increase <style=cIsDamage>attack speed</style> by up to <style=cIsDamage>{0} <style=cStack>(+{1} per stack)</style></style> the closer you are to a Teleporter.
strings.FREE_ITEM_ARROWHEAD_PICKUP: Burn enemies for flat damage on hit.
strings.FREE_ITEM_ARROWHEAD_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>100%</style> chance to <style=cIsDamage>burn</style> on hit for <style=cIsDamage>{0} <style=cStack>(+{1} per stack)</style></style> damage.
